rows.label: qst502018_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey! Hey, Onee-chan,
can you believe this?

rows.label: qst502018_msg0002
rows.name:
The speed of light and
sound are different!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0003
rows.name: Oh, is that so?

rows.label: qst502018_msg0004
rows.name:
It was written in a book,
but I can't believe it.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0005
rows.name:
It's an old, cheap book, so it's
probably just making things up.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0006
rows.name: ...Shall we test it?

rows.label: qst502018_msg0007
rows.name: An experiment!? Can you do it?

rows.label: qst502018_msg0008
rows.name:
I'll go somewhere far away and release
some lightning, and you can see if you
hear the sound after you see the flash.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0009
rows.name: I'll do it!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0010
rows.name:
Then I'll go outside the
village! Please wait a moment!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0011
rows.name: Whoa...! Amazing...

rows.label: qst502018_msg0012
rows.name:
The sound really did come
later! Light is faster!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0013
rows.name:
You're amazing, Onee-chan!
That lightning was perfect
for the experiment.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0014
rows.name: Ehehe. I'm glad we could test it.

rows.label: qst502018_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah, thank you!!

rows.label: qst502018_msg0016
rows.name: Is she not back yet...

rows.label: qst502018_msg0017
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst502018_msg0018
rows.name: Nothing's happening...

rows.label: qst502018_msg0019
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I couldn't seem
to muster the power, so I
couldn't show you...

rows.label: qst502018_msg0020
rows.name:
It's okay, it's okay. Show me
when you're feeling better.
